about.name: Fitero Isabela-Alexandra
occupations: Lecturer (Department of Computer Science) at Babes-Bolyai University, Cluj-Napoca, Romania
about.text:
Hello!

Name's Isabela, and I am currently a Lecturer at BBU of Cluj-Napoca, and also a full-stack software developer.
Besides computer science, my hobbies include cleaning and organazing stuff (yes, really!), gardening, and I've also recently developed an interest for baking (but I am still learning).
I am a cat person, and I love chilly and cloudy weather.

This is my university teacher webpage. Here I will post useful information for my students regarding the subjects that I teach.
